document_title: Knee joint space stenosis: Causes, signs, diagnosis and treatment
subsection_name: hep-khe-khop-goi.json_4_Complications of knee joint space narrowing
subsection_content:
In many cases, narrowing of the knee joint space can be an early sign of arthritis, the most common of which is rheumatoid arthritis. In addition, if this condition is not treated promptly, there is a risk of leading to many serious complications as follows: (3)
Bleeding near the joint; Osteonecrosis of the knee.; Knees lose mobility.
